scripts.build: npm run sync && rm -rf ProbExtShield && mkdir ProbExtShield && cp -R src/* ProbExtShield && zip -r ProbExtShield-v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version").zip ProbExtShield && rm -rf ProbExtShield
scripts.release-gh: npm run release && gh release create v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version") --generate-notes
scripts.version: npm run sync && git add src/manifest.json
scripts.deploy: npm version patch && git push origin main --follow-tags
